question: Which country has provided AI- based technology and advanced equipment to AIIMS, India?
explanation:
Israel has recently provided its artificial intelligence (AI) based technologies and equipment to the All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi.
The technologies include contact-less monitoring applications, advanced medical management systems and AI-based solutions comprising AI assistant robots. The Prime Ministers of both the countries were affiliating with each other for identifying the areas of mutual cooperation.
